Title: Tetsusaiga and Tenseiga
Actors: Kappei Yamaguchi, Satsuki Yukino, Kumiko Watanabe
Plot: The Tenseiga and the Tetsusaiga, two great swords that were forged by swordsmith Totosai, have been left to Sesshomaru and Inuyasha by their father. Sesshomaru wants a sword to fight with and is unsatisfied with the Tenseiga, a he...
